channel.title: English on Seasalt.ai - Anyone, Anywhere. Natural, Personalized, and Actionable Conversations with Customers
channel.description: Recent content in English on Seasalt.ai - Anyone, Anywhere. Natural, Personalized, and Actionable Conversations with Customers

item.title: ChatGPT-Powered Contact Centers: Transforming Customer Support in the Digital Age - June 29, 2023
item.description: Traditional contact center automations can be tricky to define and complicated and time consuming to set up. ChatGPT integrations empower contact centers with flexible automations that effortlessly handle atypical cases while drastically reducing implementation time and complexity. From advanced chatbots to automated agent evaluation, unlock the potential of streamlined tools that revolutionize contact center operations with Seasalt.ai.

item.title: Auto Dialer and Voicemail Drop for Contact Centers: Supercharge Your Throughput & Multiply Your Agents - January 19, 2023
item.description: Calling your customers can be a slow and inefficient process. Sitting on the phone all day delivering standard messages and leaving voicemails wastes your agents’ time and takes them away from productively engaging with more customers. Seasalt AI, Inc and Twilio Inc launched SeaX, a one-stop cloud call center solution with integrated auto dialers, automating your repetitive calling tasks and freeing up your agents to actually talk with your customers.

item.title: Voice Intelligence for Better Workforce Management and Customer Insights - August 11, 2022
item.description: Contact centers accumulate massive amounts of voice data through all the customer conversations they have every single day. SeaMeet puts that data to work, delivering voice intelligence insights from speech, text, and conversation to you. Seasalt AI, Inc and Twilio Inc launched SeaX, a one-stop cloud call center solution that natively integrates SeaMeet, keeping track of everything that is happening in your call center.

item.title: SeaX Contact Center Case Management - July 7, 2022
item.description: Call center case management and support tickets are the backbone of organized and efficient customer support. Seasalt AI, Inc and Twilio Inc launched SeaX, a one-stop cloud call center solution with integrated case management, putting case information and recording directly at your agents’ fingertips all in one convenient interface.

item.title: SeaX Contact Center Solutions and AI Intelligent Knowledge Base - June 2, 2022
item.description: Efficiency and accuracy are hallmarks of great customer support and call center workflows. Seasalt AI, Inc and Twilio Inc launched SeaX, a one-stop cloud call center solution with incorporated knowledge base, enabling agents fast and easy access to accurate and up-to-date information and response templates while assisting customers.
